DOC.brief_summary: To determine EGFR mutation status in patients with advanced stage adenocarcinoma NSCLC. To determine the association between EGFR mutation status and demographic data in advanced stage adenocarcinoma NSCLC patients.
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Molecular Epidemiology Study in Singapore Patients With Advanced Non Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) of Adenocarcinoma Histology to Assess Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor (EGFR) Mutation Status
DOC.keyword: EGFR mutation status in patients with advanced stage adenocarcinoma NSCLC
The association between EGFR mutation status and demographic data in advanced stage adenocarcinoma NSCLC patients.
